item.title: West Virginia National Guard member dies after being shot in DC attack, Trump says

item.title: Police investigate after American man found fatally stabbed in Tobago
item.description: The death of an American man apparently fatally stabbed on the Caribbean island of Tobago is being investigated as a murder.

item.title: 6.0 magnitude earthquake strikes northwest of Anchorage, Alaska: USGS
item.description: A 6.0 magnitude earthquake has struck northwest of Anchorage, Alaska, according to the U.S. Geological Survey.
